amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Community colleges; responsibility for courses at associate-degree level or below.
amendatorysection.para: The community colleges shall have, except in specified program areas authorized by statute and the Coordinating Commission for Postsecondary Education, sole responsibility for the award of associate degrees, diplomas, and certificates comprised of courses at the associate-degree level or below and approved by the commission pursuant to sections 85-1413 and 85-1414.
